nodes.text: Bakura was a planet located in the galaxy's Wild Space. It was connected to the planet Endor by a hyperspace route. At some point, the Resistance pilot Venisa Doza and her astromech droid Torch had an adventure on Bakura, which Doza brought up while attempting to plan her escape from the First Order Star Destroyer that had captured her starfighter.
In George Lucas' rough draft script for Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith, Grievous referred to Anakin Skywalker as "the young hero of Bakura."

In Star Wars Legends, Bakura was the planet where a truce was signed between Wilek Nereus and Leia Organa Solo which was a temporary cessation of hostilities between the Galactic Empire and the Rebel Alliance.
